## ğŸ§­ Objective:  
Group countries based on historical indicators using k-means clustering.

## âœï¸ Prompt:  
What patterns emerge in the clusters? Are there geographic or ideological groupings?

## ğŸ“¥ Load Data
```{r. lab06b}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
indicators <- read_csv(here::here("assets/datasets/state_indicators.csv"))
set.seed(42)
clusters <- kmeans(indicators[, -1], centers = 4)
indicators$cluster <- clusters$cluster

ggplot(indicators, aes(x = literacy_rate, y = military_spending, color = factor(cluster))) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Clustering States by Historical Indicators",
       x = "Literacy Rate", y = "Military Spending") +
  theme_minimal()
```
